pageSetting.title: 地区差异调节系数管理导入

column.name: jglb
column.annotate: 信贷业务网点、小额农贷网点、服务型网点、其他

column.name: ywlb
column.annotate: 存款业务、贷款业务、中间业务、 综合管理类、业务量

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核角色输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jglb)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'业务类别输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.ywlb)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.qsrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.qsrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'差异系数输入错误，只能输入:15位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.cyxs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.cyxs,15,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'差异系数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.cyxs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set error=error||'机构类别不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_jglb jglb where rtrim(jglb.lbmc) = rtrim(t.jglb)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set error=error||'业务类型不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_ywlb ywlb where rtrim(ywlb.ms) = rtrim(t.ywlb)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from CSB_DQYWCYXS tar ,CSB_JGLB CSB_JGLB0,CSB_YWLB CSB_YWLB1 where 1=1 and t.jglb=CSB_JGLB0.LBMC and CSB_JGLB0.LBDH=tar.JGLB and t.ywlb=CSB_YWLB1.MS and CSB_YWLB1.YWLB=tar.YWLB and tar.QSRQ >= cast(t.qsrq as DECIMAL(22,0)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dqcytjxsgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select jglb,ywlb from dqcytjxsgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by jglb,ywlb having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.jglb=dr.jglb and t.ywlb=dr.ywlb) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE dqcytjxsgldr_temp ( jglb varchar(100) , ywlb varchar(100) , qsrq varchar(100) , cyxs varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dqcytjxsgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from dqcytjxsgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, jglb,ywlb,qsrq,cyxs,khdxdh,error from dqcytjxsgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, jglb,ywlb,qsrq,cyxs,khdxdh,error from dqcytjxsgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, jglb,ywlb,qsrq,cyxs,khdxdh,error from dqcytjxsgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from CSB_DQYWCYXS tar where exists ( select 1 from $temp$ t ,CSB_JGLB CSB_JGLB0,CSB_YWLB CSB_YWLB1 where (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error ='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and cast(t.jglb as VARCHAR(50) )=CSB_JGLB0.LBMC and CSB_JGLB0.LBDH=tar.JGLB and cast(t.ywlb as VARCHAR(200) )=CSB_YWLB1.MS and CSB_YWLB1.YWLB=tar.YWLB and tar.qsrq>= cast(t.qsrq as integer) )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update CSB_DQYWCYXS tar set jsrq=(select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.qsrq as Integer),-1) from dqcytjxsgldr_temp dr,CSB_JGLB CSB_JGLB0,CSB_YWLB CSB_YWLB1 where 1=1 and cast(dr.jglb as VARCHAR(50) )=CSB_JGLB0.LBMC and CSB_JGLB0.LBDH=tar.JGLB and cast(dr.ywlb as VARCHAR(200) )=CSB_YWLB1.MS and CSB_YWLB1.YWLB=tar.YWLB and (length(dr.error)=0 or dr.error is null or dr.error='数据已存在!') and dr.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$) where exists( select 1 from dqcytjxsgldr_temp t ,CSB_JGLB CSB_JGLB0,CSB_YWLB CSB_YWLB1 where 1=1 and cast(t.jglb as VARCHAR(50) )=CSB_JGLB0.LBMC and CSB_JGLB0.LBDH=tar.JGLB and cast(t.ywlb as VARCHAR(200) )=CSB_YWLB1.MS and CSB_YWLB1.YWLB=tar.YWLB and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null or t.error='数据已存在!') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and tar.jsrq>=F_Change_Days(cast(t.qsrq as Integer),-1))

update CSB_DQYWCYXS tar set tar.jsrq = (select F_Change_Days(cast(dr.qsrq as Integer), -1) from dqcytjxsgldr_temp dr inner join CSB_JGLB jglb on jglb.lbmc=cast(dr.jglb as VARCHAR(50)) inner join CSB_YWLB ywlb on ywlb.ms=cast(dr.ywlb as VARCHAR(200)) where (dr.error = '数据已存在!' or length(dr.error) = 0 or dr.error is null) and dr.khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$ and jglb.lbdh=tar.jglb and ywlb.ywlb=tar.ywlb) where tar.jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from CSB_DQYWCYXS xs inner join CSB_JGLB jglb on jglb.lbdh=xs.jglb inner join CSB_YWLB ywlb on ywlb.ywlb=xs.ywlb inner join dqcytjxsgldr_temp dr on jglb.lbmc=cast(dr.jglb as VARCHAR(50)) and ywlb.ms=cast(dr.ywlb as VARCHAR(200)) and dr.khdxdh =$login_khdxdh$ and (dr.error = '数据已存在!' or length(dr.error) = 0 or dr.error is null) )
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into CSB_DQYWCYXS(JGLB,YWLB,QSRQ,JSRQ,CYXS) select CSB_JGLB0.LBDH,CSB_YWLB1.YWLB,cast (t.qsrq as DECIMAL(22,0)),29991231,cast (t.cyxs as DECIMAL(19,5)) from dqcytjxsgldr_temp t ,CSB_JGLB CSB_JGLB0,CSB_YWLB CSB_YWLB1 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and CSB_JGLB0.LBMC=cast (t.jglb as VARCHAR(50)) and CSB_YWLB1.MS=cast (t.ywlb as VARCHAR(200))
